name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂【福岡サンパレス】 [ysmbvtf3_bc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A static screen showing the sponsors for the live tour: JOYSOUND and Fukuya.
A commercial for JOYSOUND X1 featuring a man discussing the benefits of modern karaoke.
A commercial for Fukuya's 'MEN CHEESE' series featuring characters Mako and Kireo.
A collage of fan messages and tour information slides including 'Attention' and 'Goods' lists.

subtitles.original: SPONSORS 協賛
subtitles.english: SPONSORS

subtitles.original: 最近行ったのよ、カラオケ。
subtitles.english: I went to karaoke recently.

subtitles.original: なんさ、2時間で解散と思うじゃん。
subtitles.english: You know, you'd think we'd call it a night after two hours.

subtitles.original: そっからなのよ。
subtitles.english: But that's when the real fun starts.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: 色んなことできるわけ。ヤバいぞ。
subtitles.english: You can do so many things. It's awesome.

subtitles.original:
PLAY! NEW (X).
X PARK
subtitles.english:
PLAY! NEW (X).
X PARK

subtitles.original: X PARK最高。
subtitles.english: X PARK is the best.

subtitles.original: JOYSOUND X1
subtitles.english: JOYSOUND X1

subtitles.original:
明太子をつくってよかった。
博多中洲 ふくや
subtitles.english:
I'm glad I made mentaiko.
Hakata Nakasu Fukuya

subtitles.original: ふくや。
subtitles.english: Fukuya.

subtitles.original: 明太子がー！
subtitles.english: The mentaiko is...!

subtitles.original: 切袴？
subtitles.english: Kireo?

subtitles.original: マコ？
subtitles.english: Mako?

subtitles.original: 姫、明太子が生まれ変わる新しい技を編み出してきました。
subtitles.english: Princess, I've devised a new technique that transforms mentaiko.

subtitles.original: いきます！
subtitles.english: Here I go!

subtitles.original: ふくやの明太子から生まれたメンチーズシリーズ。
subtitles.english: The Men Cheese series, born from Fukuya's mentaiko.

subtitles.original: ピリリな味わい、マコも大好き！
subtitles.english: A spicy flavor that Mako loves too!

subtitles.original: 詳しくはWebで！
subtitles.english: Check the web for details!

subtitles.original: My name is Clarity Powers and I sing in Sony Pictures projects.
subtitles.english: My name is Clarity Powers and I sing in Sony Pictures projects.

subtitles.original: When you fell from the sky, you created quite a buzz for us here.
subtitles.english: When you fell from the sky, you created quite a buzz for us here.

subtitles.original: And this song is much better than anything else I could say.
subtitles.english: And this song is much better than anything else I could say.

subtitles.original: It's called "Spectra of Nova" off of the album "Stellar Stellar."
subtitles.english: It's called "Spectra of Nova" off of the album "Stellar Stellar."

subtitles.original:
開演までしばらくお待ちください
The concert will be starting soon.
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
Attention
ご来場のお客様へ
subtitles.english:
Attention
To all visitors

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 声出し応援OKです
subtitles.english: Cheering loudly is OK.
